state.output:
<file>
00001| generator client {
00002|   provider = "prisma-client-js"
00003| }
00004| 
00005| datasource db {
00006|   provider  = "postgresql"
00007|   url       = env("DATABASE_URL")
00008|   directUrl = env("DIRECT_URL")
00009| }
00010| 
00011| model Account {
00012|   id                String  @id @default(cuid())
00013|   userId            String
00014|   type              String
00015|   provider          String
00016|   providerAccountId String
00017|   refresh_token     String?
00018|   access_token      String?
00019|   expires_at        Int?
00020|   token_type        String?
00021|   scope             String?
00022|   id_token          String?
00023|   session_state     String?
00024|   user              User    @relation(fields: [userId], references: [id], onDelete: Cascade)
00025| 
00026|   @@unique([provider, providerAccountId])
00027| }
00028| 
00029| model Session {
00030|   id           String   @id @default(cuid())
00031|   sessionToken String   @unique
00032|   userId       String
00033|   expires      DateTime
00034|   user         User     @relation(fields: [userId], references: [id], onDelete: Cascade)
00035| }
00036| 
00037| model User {
00038|   id                 String               @id @default(cuid())
00039|   name               String?
00040|   email              String?              @unique
00041|   emailVerified      DateTime?
00042|   image              String?
00043|   createdAt          DateTime             @default(now())
00044|   updatedAt          DateTime             @updatedAt
00045|   accounts           Account[]
00046|   glossaryEntries    GlossaryEntry[]
00047|   sessions           Session[]
00048|   translations       Translation[]
00049|   translationHistory TranslationHistory[]
00050| 
00051|   @@map("users")
00052| }
00053| 
00054| model VerificationToken {
00055|   identifier String
00056|   token      String   @unique
00057|   expires    DateTime
00058| 
00059|   @@unique([identifier, token])
00060| }
00061| 
00062| model Translation {
00063|   id             String   @id @default(cuid())
00064|   sourceText     String
00065|   translatedText String
00066|   sourceLang     String
00067|   targetLang     String
00068|   domain         String   @default("general")
00069|   userId         String
00070|   createdAt      DateTime @default(now())
00071|   updatedAt      DateTime @updatedAt
00072|   user           User     @relation(fields: [userId], references: [id], onDelete: Cascade)
00073| 
00074|   @@index([userId, createdAt])
00075| }
00076| 
00077| model GlossaryEntry {
00078|   id        String   @id @default(cuid())
00079|   source    String
00080|   target    String
00081|   domain    String   @default("general")
00082|   notes     String?
00083|   userId    String
00084|   createdAt DateTime @default(now())
00085|   updatedAt DateTime @updatedAt
00086|   user      User     @relation(fields: [userId], references: [id], onDelete: Cascade)
00087| 
00088|   @@unique([userId, source, domain])
00089|   @@index([userId, domain])
00090| }
00091| 
00092| model TranslationHistory {
00093|   id             String   @id @default(cuid())
00094|   sourceText     String
00095|   translatedText String
00096|   sourceLang     String
00097|   targetLang     String
00098|   domain         String   @default("general")
00099|   userId         String
00100|   createdAt      DateTime @default(now())
00101|   user           User     @relation(fields: [userId], references: [id], onDelete: Cascade)
00102| 
00103|   @@index([userId, createdAt])
00104| }
00105| 
</file>

metadata.preview:
generator client {
  provider = "prisma-client-js"
}

datasource db {
  provider  = "postgresql"
  url       = env("DATABASE_URL")
  directUrl = env("DIRECT_URL")
}

model Account {
  id                String  @id @default(cuid())
  userId            String
  type              String
  provider          String
  providerAccountId String
  refresh_token     String?
  access_token      String?
  expires_at        Int?
  token_type        String?

state.title: prisma/schema.prisma
